entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening then changing to rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
